title: Lady Gaga to Replace BeyoncĂŠ as Coachella Headliner: Report
text:
Out go the Bey Hive, in come the Little Monsters.
Lady Gaga will reportedly be replacing BeyoncĂŠ as the top Coachella headliner on consecutive Saturday nights, according to Billboard .Â 
Five days ago, it was announced thatÂ BeyoncĂŠ, who is pregnant with twins , had toÂ postpone her performance at this yearâ€™s Coachella on the advice of her doctors.
The publication also noted that it was important to Coachella organizers, AEG Live and Goldenvoice, that a female performer substitute forÂ BeyoncĂŠ.
If Gaga is confirmed, sheâ€™ll be the first woman to be double-billingÂ the festivalÂ sinceÂ BjĂśrk in 2007. BeyoncĂŠ confirmed that sheâ€™ll be headlining 2018â€™s Coachella dates.
